attributes.action: Penalise companies who outsource to boost profits
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Stop companies from outsourcing all our call centres and skilled jobs to other countries in the name of profits. They should be forced to pay far more tax to offset the so called savings they are making by employing cheap, less skilled workers in other countries. If the trend continues how long will it be before the only jobs available are working for mcdonalds or tesco?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
